definition: Xinzhu or Hsinchu city in northern Taiwan, noted for high tech industries/Xinzhu or Hsinchu county in northwest Taiwan
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
new/newly/meso- (chemistry)
bamboo/CL:棵[ke1],支[zhi1],根[gen1]/Kangxi radical 118
Hsinchu, city in north Taiwan noted for its high tech industries
Xinzhu or Hsinchu County in northwest Taiwan

sentences.english: Dozens more companies dot the Neihu-Hsinchu corridor.
sentences.chinese: 好多的电脑公司星罗棋布于内湖到新竹的通道。

sentences.english: The average DBH of new bamboo increased with the increasing distance from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 随距阔叶树基干距离的增加，新竹平均胸径迅速增加。

sentences.english: Displaying railway facilities were under construction in front of Hsin-Chu Station.
sentences.chinese: 新竹车站前施工中的铁道展示区。

sentences.english: Tsyr-Huey Liou is a professor of Department of Early Childhood Education, National Hsinchu University.
sentences.chinese: 刘慈惠，国立新竹教育大学幼儿教育系，教授。

sentences.english: Xinzhu was rated the most liveable place behind Taipei, followed by Tainan and Taizhong cities.
sentences.chinese: 新竹的名次仅次于台北，接著是台南及台中市。

sentences.english: Hsinchu city water has a positive LSI value and precipitating tendency.
sentences.chinese: 新竹自来水水质LSI为正值，水质具结垢倾向。

sentences.english: The daughter reported her mother to the National Police Agency and the Hsinchu County Police Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 这位女儿向内政部警政署和新竹县警察局报案。

definition: Miaoli city and county in northwest Taiwan

Tainan (city and county in Taiwan)
Jiayi or Chiayi city and county in west Taiwan
Puli, town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Nantou city and county in central Taiwan

Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Chilung or Keelung, city and major port in north Taiwan
Kaohsiung or Gaoxiong city in south Taiwan
Taizhong or Taichung city and county in central Taiwan
Taizhong or Taichung city in central Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei county in north Taiwan
Taipei county in north Taiwan (now renamed 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4])
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Xinzhu or Hsinchu County in northwest Taiwan
